pages.text: Nature's Aura is a mod about collecting, using and replenishing the Aura naturally present in the world to create useful devices and unique mechanics. $(li)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/natures-aura)Curseforge$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://discord.com/invite/Uy2ZM9X)Ellpeck's discord$(/l)
